name: No Need For Wheels
description:
A gravity defying racing game inspired by F-Zero.  Up to 4 can play split screen. Supports game controllers, (although only tested with GameCube).  Collect 3 of the green boxes to get a boost.  Drifting is important if you want to win!  I would love to see people try to speed-run this.  Try to get a best lap time of under 2:30!

This was my capstone project for my ATEC degree at the University of Texas at Dallas.  I worked on this for 6 months and I'm very happy with the results.  I made the track very long in order to showcase all the different features of my program.

Coming Soon (maybe):  sound effects, car select, other tracks.
